208a6('dul ba): dang ldan pas mi khom pa dgu pa lags so/ / 'char khas smras pa/ sring mo dag khyed kyis 'ga' zhig 'di skad ces/ dug can la sogs rgyal po yis// bya ba dag ni ma
208a7('dul ba): byas par/ / de dag nyid dang bya ba rnams// zhig pa nyid du gyur pa yin// bya ba de dag nyid kyang ni// yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par// 'jig rten dgra bo 'chi bdag/
208b1('dul ba): de/ 'ong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// zhes smras pa ma thos sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa 'char kha de'i slad du bdag cag skyed mos tshal du mchis te/ rgyal byed kyi
208b2('dul ba): tshal du 'jug pa dang / gtsug lag khang blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i slad du mchis pa lags so//
208b3('dul ba): 'char khas smras pa/ sring mo dag gal te khyed cag de'i phyir 'ongs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas legs so/
208b4('dul ba): legs so// sring mo dag de ni mjal gyis/ 'di ltar ltad mo ji ltar blta bar dri bar bya'o// sring mo dag khyed cag gang du 'jug par byed/ btsun pa 'char la bdag cag kun
208b5('dul ba): dga'i re bar 'jug cing gtsug lag khang blta bar 'tshal lo/ / sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas// sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la
208b6('dul ba): gom 'dor na/ / 'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi srang tshad ni// stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min// zhes gsungs pas/ de yang legs so// sring mo dag khyed kyis gang khyed
208b7('dul ba): cag gtsug lag khang ston par byed pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig btsal tam/ 'phags pa ci bdag cag sgron ma sug pa na thogs bzhin du zhugs gzhan du tshol lam/ btsun pa 'char
209a1('dul ba): kha spangs te/ dge slong gzhan ga la tshol/ khyod pas gzhan khyad par du 'phags pa su zhig mchis kyis/ khyod nyid kyis bstan du gsol/ de nasna tshed
209a2('dul ba): ldan pa 'char la 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'di dag gtsug lag khang bstan par bya na ni bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par yang 'gyur/ gal te bstan par mi byan
209a3('dul ba): ni tshig pa'i bsod snyoms kyang ster bar mi 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma dad pa rnams dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ gtul bar bya/
209a4('dul ba): gzud par bya/ rab tu bkod par bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de'i phyir 'di dag dge ba la nges par sbyar bar byas/ rnam pa thams cad du bstan par bya'o snyam du rig nas/ des ma
209a5('dul ba): tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa sna tshogs thogs te pog por log tu blangs nas/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par brtsams te/ sring mo dag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
209a6('dul ba): kyi dri gtsang khang ste/ gang du bcom ldan 'das nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/ gang ni nyams par 'gyur/
209a7('dul ba): gang ni phel bar 'gyur/ gang ni gnod par gyur/ gang ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/ gang ni mi bde bar gyur/ gang ni gnod pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / mi bde bar gyur/ gang ni
209b1('dul ba): ngan song la gzhol/ gang ni ngan song la 'bab/ gang ni ngan song la bab/ gang ni ngan song gi lam nas bslangs te mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya
209b2('dul ba): 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya/ 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/ gang gis sangs
209b3('dul ba): rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa gang ni yongs su
209b4('dul ba): smin par bya/ yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya/ zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug cing / 'di ltar/ chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa// dus las 'da'
209b5('dul ba): bar 'gyur srid kyi/ / sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni// dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la// rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar//
209b6('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la// rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad// kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi// bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshe'u mi skyo
209b7('dul ba): srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni/ / rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no// zhes bya ba 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
210a1('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs bcu'i spobs dang ldan pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bu/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' ba
210a2('dul ba): 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis/ 'di'i zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig/ 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u dir+ya'i gtsug lag 'ang ste
210a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / 'dren pa med pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa med pa na/ de'i dang por ye shes kyi mig sman gyi thur mas/ gang gi
210a4('dul ba): chos kyi mig rnam par sbyangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rnams dang / rgyal tshab lta bu rnams dang / yun ring po nas rab tu byung ba rnams dang / tshangs par spyod pa mngon par spyad pa rnams dang /
210a5('dul ba): snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa/ gang gi rgyud la de'i dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/
210a6('dul ba): lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang mthun par bskor mi nus pa/ chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba mang po'i don dang / skye bo mang po la phan
210a7('dul ba): pa dang bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjes su thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su
210b1('dul ba): bskor ba de'i yin gyis/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'chol cig/ 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/ bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu rmon pa do
210b2('dul ba): stong du gcig gis mchog pa spangs te rab tu byung ba/ dbyig bye ba phrag drug cu dang ldan pa gser gyi nas bang chung brgyad cu bdog pa/ bran gyi grong bco brgyad bdog pa/ sbyor ba'i
210b3('dul ba): grong bcu drug bdog pa/ ser skya bzang mo lus gser bas lhag pa dang ldan pa/ mchil ma'i thal ba smin pa ltar spangs te mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ras sbyar ma'i snam sbyar rin thang
210b4('dul ba): 'bum ri ba thogs te/ 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi phyir rab tu byung ba bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
210b5('dul ba): par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir nags na rten pa gang yin pa/ gang mthong na spos kyi glang po che dag kyang rgyags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang gis/ bu mangs kyi mchod rten du ston pa khas
210b6('dul ba): blangs nas dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'dod pa chung ba/ chog shes pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba rnams kyi nang
210b7('dul ba): na mchog ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong 'od srungs chen po'o zhes gsungs shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis/ 'dir
211a1('dul ba): yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig/ 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gtsug lag khang ste/ mchog thob pa'i bu gang yin pa/ gang lo brgyad gnyis
211a2('dul ba): su dbang po'i brda' sprong pa bklags pa/ rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab chen po rnams dang
211a3('dul ba): spobs pa chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad gang gi cha bcu drug par gzhag cing / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de bzhin
211a4('dul ba): gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ / 'jig rten kun gyi shes rab gang // shA ri'i bu ye shes rab kyi// bcu drug char yang mi tshig go// gal te lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di// shA ri'i
211a5('dul ba): bu dang mnyam gyur pas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi// bcu drug char yang mi chog go// zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis/ 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag
211a6('dul ba): 'tshal cig/ 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/ mdun na 'don gyi bu cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung ba gang yin pa gang gis
211a7('dul ba): lha'i dbang po brgya byin khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos lan gsum du bskul/ kun tu bskul/ kun tu rab tu bskul ba gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bcom
211b1('dul ba): ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od can du nyin mtshan bdun gyis gshegs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang mthu chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin
